name: Clock Race
description:
Title: Clock Runner

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

For those who enjoy pressing a single button repeatedly, sometimes a second button. Clock Runners is for you! This game has hours of mindless content! (Because it only ends when you want it to!). It's endless, but that does not mean there is much to behold.

Caution: Clock Runners does not contain any clocks or clock elements. The only reason Clocks are brought up in the first place is to see how long the player can stay sane while playing this game.

Instructions:

Repeatedly press the "Up" arrow key to save your character's life! Otherwise, they will fall and perish.

When you inevitably perish, press the return key to relive their torment! (Fun!)

Game Design Team

Joseph Steen - Game Designer
